project.description: I'll do deployment of jars on the spark jobserver on production

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
releaseIdentifier=Release_Spark-Jobserver-Prod_${IDENTIFIER} rm -rf tokenizer/target/scala-2.10/BigParser-assembly-1.0.jar rm -rf tokenizer/target/* cd tokenizer sbt clean sbt assembly if [ $? != 0 ] then echo "Build failed due to code is not compilable" exit 1 fi cd ..
#scp tokenizer/target/scala-2.10/BigParser-assembly-1.0.jar prod-hadoop-jobserver.bigparser.com:/tmp #scp tokenizer/src/main/resources/dev_local.conf prod-hadoop-jobserver.bigparser.com:/home/hadoop/job-server/local.conf #ssh prod-hadoop-jobserver.bigparser.com "curl --data-binary @/tmp/BigParser-assembly-1.0.jar localhost:8090/jars/bigparser" #ssh prod-hadoop-jobserver.bigparser.com "cp /tmp/BigParser-assembly-1.0.jar /home/hadoop/spark/user-jars/" #ssh prod-hadoop-jobserver.bigparser.com "rm -rf /tmp/BigParser-assembly-1.0.jar" #ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no hadoop@$SERVER "curl -X DELETE 'localhost:8090/contexts/dataparsing-context'" #ssh prod-hadoop-jobserver.bigparser.com "/home/hadoop/job-server/server_stop.sh && /home/hadoop/job-server/server_start.sh && sleep 1m" #ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no hadoop@$SERVER "curl -d '' 'localhost:8090/contexts/dataparsing-context?num-cpu-cores=4&memory-per-node=512m'"
${HOME}/scripts/releaseIdentifier.sh $releaseIdentifier ${WORKSPACE}/tokenizer/target/scala-2.10/BigParser-assembly-1.0.jar
